item.title: Adding RevenueCat to payments and billing
item.description: https://www.revenuecat.com/) — Hosted backend for in-app purchases and subscriptions (iOS and Android - Hosted backend for in-app purchases and subscriptions (iOS and Android). Free up to $10k/mo in tracked revenue.

item.title: Add Kreya
item.description: https://kreya.app - Free gRPC GUI client to call and test gRPC APIs. Can import gRPC APIs via server reflection.

item.title: Remove Whales from the Docker-related list
Add limits of Hook Relay's free plan
item.description: https://www.hookrelay.dev/ - - Add webhook support to your app without the hassles: done-for-you queueing, retries with backoff, and logging. The free plan has 100 deliveries per day, 14-day retention, and 3 hook endpoints.

item.title: Add Hook Relay
item.description: https://www.hookrelay.dev/ - - Add webhook support to your app without the hassles: done-for-you queueing, retries with backoff, and logging.

item.title: Update Honeybadger's offer
item.description: https://www.honeybadger.io) - Exception, uptime, and cron monitoring. Free for small teams and open-source projects (12,000 errors/month - Exception, uptime, and cron monitoring. Free for small teams and open-source projects (12,000 errors/month).

item.title: Add MeisterTask
item.description: https://www.meistertask.com/ - Online task management for teams. Free up to 3 projects, unlimited project members.

item.title: Add Braid
item.description: https://www.braidchat.com/ - Chat app designed for teams. Free for public access group, unlimited users, history, and integrations. also it provide self-hostable open-source version.

item.title: Add Zulip
item.description: https://zulip.com/ - Real-time chat with unique email-like threading model. Free plan includes 10,000 messages of search history and File storage up to 5 GB. also it provides self-hostable open-source version.

item.title: Add Heptapod to Source Code Repos
item.description: https://foss.heptapod.net/ - Heptapod is a friendly fork of GitLab Community Edition providing support for Mercurial

item.title: Add teamwork.com
item.description: https://teamwork.com/ - Project management & Team Chat. Free for 5 users and 2 projects. Premium plans available.
